QuestData.Title: Rotting Riverbeasts
QuestData.Description: The botani are infecting the local riverbeasts with some kind of strange flesh-eating plant.$b$bI fear this infection could spread to our people.$b$bIf you see any infested riverbeasts, kill the blooming plants that inhabit their bodies... before they kill you.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need to stop this infestation.
QuestData.RewardText: This news is disturbing to say the least. I'm shocked the infestation has spread so quickly.
